lead_paragraph: "What football cannot survive without, is the ball," David Goldblatt writes in a preface to Jessica Hilltout's book, "Amen: Grassroots Football."
snippet: Jessica Hilltout depicts the individuality of African footballs - and the people who play with them, Kristen Joy Watts reports.

headline.main: Passion and Imagination in African Football

abstract: Jessica Hilltout depicts the individuality of African footballs - and the people who play with them, Kristen Joy Watts reports.
